block.p: HULL - WEINBERGER - Roberta Vera. Died on June 28th, 2000 at Memorial-Sloan Kettering in New York City. Wife of the late Leonard Hull. Beloved mother to Eric Balzer, Paul Balzer, Wendy Medieros and Lisa Marks. Loving grandmother to Sam, Josh, Selia, Lucas, Sophie and Veronica. Beloved sister to Helaina Bruno. Dear friend and colleague to many. Long-time resident of Long Beach, N.Y. Roberta worked for The New York Times for 23 years, holding various positions in the Advertising and Marketing Departments, retiring in 1998 as a Marketing Manager. We love you and will miss you so very much. You were an inspiration in so many ways. Services will be held Friday, June 30th, 1:30PM at the Hempstead Funeral Home, 89 Peninsula Blvd, Hempstead, L.I. Donations to the Leukemia Society in Roberta's name would be appreciated.
